summary: Get DOG: Loyalty, Strength, Resilience—Dominate the Pack! - "DOG" is the new slang twist from "MOG," and it’s all about leveling up over someone else. While "MOG" is all about flexing those muscles and showing who's physically superior, "DOG" flips the script to highlight qualities like loyalty, grit, and staying power. Picture the best traits of a loyal dog—mental toughness and unshakeable dedication. This term started popping off in online self-improvement and fitness circles around the early 2020s. If you're "DOGGING," you're not just about the physical game, you're about that relentless, ride-or-die mindset.
